mapper.select: SELECT a.device_id , a.device_name , a.device_ip , b.err_type , b.count FROM ( SELECT device_ip , err_type , COUNT(err_type) AS count FROM gztls_error GROUP BY err_type, device_ip ) b LEFT JOIN gztls_device a ON a.device_ip = b.device_ip WHERE device_id = #{device_id}
SELECT * FROM gztls_error WHERE server_time BETWEEN #{from} and #{til};

SELECT a.device_id , a.device_name , a.device_ip , a.device_latitude , a.device_longitude , b.err_code , b.err_type , b.err_message , b.server_time FROM ( SELECT * FROM gztls_error WHERE server_time BETWEEN #{from} and #{til} ) b LEFT JOIN gztls_device a ON a.device_ip = b.device_ip ORDER BY b.server_time DESC;
SELECT SUBSTR(server_time,1,4) AS year FROM gztls_error GROUP BY year;
